3.title: It's Not Good to Be King/Monster Island: The Game
3.plot: Skur is finally able to take over as Monster Leader - and he quickly realizes the position is more trouble than it's worth. When Irwin beats Dudley at the Monster Island Trading Card game he's invented, Dudley challenges Irwin to a real-life version featuring the Monsters.

8.title: Run Nerd Run/Adventures in Monstersitting
8.plot:

9.title: The Falconerd/The Head of Destiny
9.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

10.title: Nerds and Monster Bus/Zarg's Ducky Day
10.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

11.title: Nerdzilla/Monster Fever
11.plot: Dudley tries to create cold fusion and Irwin accidentally tosses the experiment into the ocean, creating a giant sea monster that threatens the island. Becky's ill and her cold germs virally spread across the island, having a bizarre effect on the monsters.

12.title: The Big Stanuna/Power to the Pimple
12.plot: Stan's title as best surfer on the island is challenged when Dudley discovers he's a natural on his ironing board. Irwin's embarrassed by a giant pimple on his forehead and hides away from Nerd Camp, but the female monsters see it and think Irwin's hot.

13.title: Zarg World/The Nerdscapades
13.plot: When Zarg orders Dudley to build him a monument, Dudley plans an amusement park while environmentalist Becky tries to stop the park's construction. Dudley and Irwin team up and battle Becky and Stan in Ice Skating, and they soon discover they're skating on something much more dangerous than just an ice pond.

14.title: Bee-Hive Yourself/Bucktooth Rogers
14.plot: When Becky discovers Bee-Cows on the island producing sweet honey, Dudley builds a factory farm and starts a honey business. A space capsule crash lands on the island and the nerds hope they'll get rescued. Unfortunately the capsule's strange astronaut is uncooperative.

15.title: Cannibal Run/Little Bundle of Terror
15.plot: Lyle warns Irwin about a cave with evil powers, and when Irwin sees Stan leaving the cave, he's convinced Stan has become a cannibal. When Urp and Durn give birth, Lyle becomes a protective older brother - and blind to his new little sister's dark side.

16.title: Survival of the Twittest/Nerds and Moonsters
16.plot: As troop leader of the Barfallo Cubs, Urp is embarrassed of his son Lyle's nerdy ways while trying to earn Cub badges. Zarg overhears Skur promising to take Maiden Cheena to the moon, and decides he wants to go, too.

17.title: Irweiner/Brother Bother
17.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

18.title: Chatty Cheena/That's Snot Art
18.plot: Irwin and Dudley hide a walkie talkie in Maiden Cheena's crown and have fun pretending to be her voice. Irwin and Stan team up as artists, but when Irwin decides to split from Stan and go it alone, the monsters hate his paintings.

19.title: Einstan/The Nerdhood of the Traveling Pants
19.plot: Dudley develops a formula that turns muscle into brain and makes Stan the smartest person in the world. When a mannequin with designer jeans falls onto the island, the nerds take turns wearing the amazing pants.

20.title: Behind the Scrotch/Night of the Living Nerds
20.plot: An old piano washes ashore and the Nerds discover that Scrotch is an amazing natural musician, so they form a band with him. A Nerd bite transforms a Monster into a Nerd, and soon the island is overrun with Nerds, making Zarg the last living Monster.

1.title: Dear Diary/Monster and Commander
1.plot: Irwin tries to secretly snatch Becky's journal to see what she thinks of him. Meanwhile, Zarg plans to throw a feast of new tastes for the Monsters. Dudley thinks the others don't take him seriously because of his height and tries to become Monster Leader. Meanwhile, Stan reverts to being a primitive beast without Dudley's guidance.

2.title: Sub Sandwich/The Dorkathalon
2.plot: When Stan teaches the monsters how to fish, Vink catches a submarine with a crew on board that the monsters plan on eating. Stan constantly beats the Nerds at physical competitions so Dudley holds a Nerd Olympics hoping he can finally defeat him.

3.title: Honk If You're in Love/Fright of Passage
3.plot: Skur thinks he can use Irwin's snoring to finally remove Zarg from the picture and have Maiden Cheena all to himself. Lyle thinks of himself as a Nerd and doesn't want to perform a Monster Rite of Passage. But when he's forced to Monster Up, the Nerds accompany him on his "nerdy" sacred quest.

4.title: The Marriage Ref/Kaboom with a View
4.plot: Becky is forced to spark some romance between the constantly bickering Urp and Durn to prove her theory that it's courting season on the island. When Dudley pigs out on a potentially exploding fruit, he can't let his temper get the best of him or he'll be blown up to nerd bits.

5.title: Are You Gonna Eat That?/Monster BFF
5.plot: Becky saves Zarg's life, and Monster Law dictates that she must now eat him. Unfortunately she's a vegetarian. When Stan realizes he has more in common with the Monsters than with the Nerds, he becomes Vink's new best friend.

6.title: For the Love of Dung/The Voice of Treason
6.plot: When Dudley declares Monster dung a new form of currency and collects all the dung on the island, the Monsters try to steal it back. Durn threatens to use Lyle's beautiful singing voice as a weapon and takes over as leader of the Monsters.

7.title: What's Mine Is Mine/The Wind Beneath My Wings
7.plot: Dudley's upset that the Nerds are always borrowing and ruining his nerdy belongings and decides to teach them a lesson. Skur is desperate to impress Maiden Cheena, so he captures Irwin to teach him his romantic tricks of the trade.

8.title: Maiden Cheena Lays an Eggie/Hero Zeros
8.plot: When Stan's football lands in Zarg's lair, the Monster Leader thinks it's Maiden Cheena's egg and his new heir. The Nerds are bitten by a 4-headed snake and discover they have super powers. Unfortunately they have no opportunity to use them.

9.title: Guys and Dolls/Heat Wave
9.plot: Irwin and Dudley fight each other with revenge dolls, but must work together when Vink threatens to destroy the dolls and the two nerds. When a heat wave causes all of his hair to fall out, an embarrassed Zarg hides out with the Nerds until his fur grows back.

10.title: Oh Brother/The Comic or The Girl
10.plot: When Skur realizes that Lyle is next in line for the throne because he's Urp and Durn's son, he pretends to be Lyle's older brother and moves in with the bickering couple. Irwin and Dudley believe Zarg has an extremely rare comic book and race against each other to claim it as their own.

11.title: Eye! Eye! Eye!/Stan by Me
11.plot: When Becky sees Vink stumbling around, she's convinced he has bad eyesight and tries to fit him with a monocle. After failing to eliminate Zarg yet again, Skur decides he needs a Nerd to come up with a brilliant plan - unfortunately he captures Stan.

12.title: Dudley the Manservant/The Cure for the Common Nerd
12.plot: Dudley loses a million dollar bet with Stan and has to pay it off by becoming Stan's butler. When Irwin sees all the attention Becky gives an ill Dudley, he pretends to get sick but the cure's side effects make him look like a legendary monster.

13.title: Fab Rick/Inside the Box
13.plot: Zarg destroys an inflatable moose that has washed ashore, thinking it's trying to steal Maiden Cheena away from him. And when Irwin tries to repair it, the moose gets stuck to him. The nerds discover a mysterious crate and when they can't open it, they each have a fantasy of what's inside the box.

14.title: Monstervision/The Squider Whisperer
14.plot: The nerds miss their favorite Sci-FI TV show so they come up with their own stage version. But when the Monsters get hooked on it, they won't let the nerds stop performing. When Stan accidentally becomes Squider King, he inadvertently causes a chain reaction that threatens the island's ecological balance.

15.title: The Host with the Moats/Monster Ball
15.plot: Irwin and Dudley try to outdo each other building sand castles, causing Zarg to be threatened and attack Nerd Camp. When Stan becomes the star of a monster sport, Zarg must come out of retirement to try and defeat him.

16.title: Flower Power/Maiden Cheena Is Missing
16.plot: Irwin picks a flower that causes the first female to sniff it to be infatuated with him - unfortunately Durn sniffs it and not Becky. When Maiden Cheena is nowhere to be found, the Nerds investigate the mystery of her disappearance.

17.title: Franken-Nerd/Monstergeist
17.plot: Dudley consumes spoiled coconut milk, turning him into a mad scientist who tries to create his own monster. Strange paranormal activity hits Nerd Camp and Becky becomes a portal to the monster underworld.

18.title: Monster Movie/Springing Lyle
18.plot: When the Nerds discover an old film camera, Becky tries to make a documentary about the wild monsters on the island. Lyle accidentally becomes joined with Vink's sister and the Nerds must find a way to save him.

19.title: Pet Peeved/No Pranks to You
19.plot: When a cute beast follows Becky back to Nerd Camp, Stan, Irwin and Dudley want to keep him as a pet, despite Becky's objections. Lyle sees the Nerds pulling pranks on each other and introduces the concept to the monsters. Unfortunately Zarg takes his pranking to extremes.

20.title: Molting Day/Zanti-Clops
20.plot: The Monsters are molting and when Monsterburgh becomes covered in white flakes, the Nerds try to turn it into a winter wonderland of fun. Lyle and a mysterious monster named Zanti-Clops help Dudley rediscover the magic of the holidays.

imdb.plot outline: Nerds and Monsters is an animated comedy that tosses a group of nerdy kids on a fantastic uncharted island. The tween castaways must use nothing but their smarts to survive the relentless attacks by the island's inhabitants - a tribe of hideous monsters that are mistakenly threatened by their human invaders. Lucky for the nerds, these dim-witted monsters don't have any smarts!
imdb.title: Nerds and Monsters
plot: _Nerds and Monsters_ (qv) is an animated comedy that tosses a group of nerdy kids on a fantastic uncharted island. The tween castaways must use nothing but their smarts to survive the relentless attacks by the island's inhabitants - a tribe of hideous monsters that are mistakenly threatened by their human invaders. Lucky for the nerds, these dim-witted monsters don't have any smarts!::Anonymous
